Articles.Content:
Holy crud, 1566 points left.

I can see why rep spamming is discouraged here... It adds up super fast.

We've discovered Green Iron Crown's only weakness, weird youtube videos!

You shall perish, despicable evildoer!

I have a feeling that something BIG will happen when this is about to end... I don't know why though... *looks worried* Unless it just never ends, who knows.

Edited January 20, 2015 by Dres
Hey there, um, still a bit of a forum noob here, so, can someone please explain WHAT THE HECK'S GOING ON??

Oh my god, what just happened to that??

Someone doesnt want everyone knowing...

I hope someone doesnt come and kill me or something...

Edited January 20, 2015 by Dres
I am the one who shall prevail. While Red and Green and Blue may fight among themselves, in their failure of unity, I win. I am the Infinite Darkness, the Absence of Color.

This is either the best or the worst raid I've ever been on... :-D

All hail RIC!

MODERATOR NOTE:

Just a quick reminder that even in silly forum game threads, we do need to respect the Forum Rules. I briefly deleted a few posts here for violating one rule in particular until I could get the necessary permissions. Since they were all pretty much duplicates of each other, I've undeleted one of them.

Carry on.

Hey there, um, still a bit of a forum noob here, so, can someone please explain WHAT THE HECK'S GOING ON??

To reiterate my answer from earlier . . .

Because following a discussion of negative rep, a joke alluding to the existence of one 'Green Iron Crown' went around. Our joke was heard by the kraken and Green Iron Crown, the pariah & conquerer of the forums came into existence. We stand and fight in the name of +rep to defend our forums from this demon.

The truth^^
I'm a moderator, part of the joke, and have NO IDEA what is going on xD

I'm a moderator, part of the joke, and have NO IDEA what is going on xD

Isn't it obvious? Eh! Steve's mouth made the universe explode and the little blonde man did a tiny, tiny dance.

No wait, that's Sweet Cuppin' Cakes. I also have no idea what's going on. Though as a guess, the above works just as well as an explanation as any.

I'm a moderator, part of the joke, and have NO IDEA what is going on xD

Joke? Joke?! This is

I'm a moderator, part of the joke, and have NO IDEA what is going on xD

Basically There is a rebel faction spreading lies and slandering our dark lord Green Iron Crown and his mighty green-lyness.

Basically There is a rebel faction spreading lies and slandering our dark lord Green Iron Crown and his mighty green-lyness.

So says the heretic!

Red Iron Crown is the only iron crown and we shall purge the corruption that is the Green Iron Crown.
And while you choose sides over colors Red, Green, and Blue, the Infinite Darkness will prevail. So long as one color is increased above the others, two colors go out.

there's a green iron crown??!

I thought there was only a red one?!?!

I want to see some pos/negs from both parties before I pick sides. If what you are saying is true, and you're fighting for the name of +rep then isn't the GIC the one you want? I don't quite understand. I'm fence sitting until I am convinced.

I want to see some pos/negs from both parties before I pick sides. If what you are saying is true, and you're fighting for the name of +rep then isn't the GIC the one you want? I don't quite understand. I'm fence sitting until I am convinced.

if you're with GIC you get rep thrown at you in fistfulls. Trust me, I'm drowning in it.
I think I may have missed an inside joke somewhere. ._.

I just read 221 posts of this. Approaching short novel length.

10/10 would read again

To be completely honest, I like to earn my rep, and I don't have a lot.. If it was getting thrown at me I think it would lose its (completely arbitrary) value. On the other hand... What is the alternative? Getting negative rep, or sitting on the fence...
tO mAkE tHiS fAiR, cAn GrEeN iRoN cRoWn FoLlOwErS gIvE oUt NeGrEp?

I think I may have missed an inside joke somewhere. ._.

Me too.

tO mAkE tHiS fAiR, cAn GrEeN iRoN cRoWn FoLlOwErS gIvE oUt NeGrEp?

Ha ha nice one....

You and Zekes are getting rep rich out of this!

Guys conserve your rep points only for the Green Iron Crown itself!

You and Zekes are getting rep rich out of this!

Eh? I'm only repping the boss. CBA with the minions.
